name: Vegan Strawberry Shortcake Pops Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: strawberry, coconut milk, lemon juice, agave nectar, dairy-free vanilla yogurt, granola, ice pop mold
recipeIngredient: Granola with freeze-dried strawberry pieces, for garnish (optional)
recipeInstructionSteps: Add the strawberries, coconut milk, lemon juice, and agave nectar to a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour the blended mixture into the ice pop mold.
If desired, dip the frozen pops in yogurt, then roll the coated pops in the granola. Place the pops on a parchment paper-lined plate and freeze again for 30 minutes.
The pops will keep in the freezer for up to 6 months in an airtight container.
